articles.title: Massive solar flare causes radio blackouts across Australia and Southeast Asia - WION
articles.description: Massive solar flare causes radio blackouts across Australia and Southeast Asia
articles.content: A massive massive solar flare erupted last night from a giant unstable sunspot, which caused radio blackouts on Earth and sent a hot plasma plume through the sun's atmosphere at speeds of 400 km/s, S… [+1947 chars]
